LOGIN001.description: Try to update the password by passing valid change passwords with admin

LOGIN002.description: Try to update the password by passing valid change passwords with user
Try to mismatch the new pwd and confirm pwd, should not update the password

expected.message: 'New Password' and 'Verify password' does not match.

LOGIN003.description: Try to Pass the pwd without any special character, should not update the password

expected.message: Password should contain atleast 1 special character.

LOGIN004.description: Try to Pass the pwd without any uppercase character, should not update the password

expected.message: Password should contain atleast 1 uppercase character.

LOGIN005.description: Try to Pass the pwd with less than 8 characters, should not update the password

expected.message: New password should be minimum of 8 character.

LOGIN006.description: Try to Pass the pwd with the same existing password, should not update the password

expected.message: Old password and new password should not be same.

LOGIN007.description: Try to Pass the pwd which doesn't match with existing password, should not update the password

expected.message: Value provided for old Password did not match.
